title: Real-time Agent Monitoring
description: Live dashboard to monitor agent activity, resource usage, and performance metrics in real-time.
fullDescription: Build a comprehensive real-time monitoring dashboard that gives developers visibility into their agents' behavior, resource consumption, and performance. Track API calls, token usage, execution time, error rates, and system health in real-time with beautiful visualizations and alerting capabilities.

timeline.note: Feature proposed and approved for Q1 2025 roadmap

title: Agent-to-Agent Messaging Protocol
description: Standardized protocol for secure communication between different agents.
fullDescription: Design and implement a standardized messaging protocol that enables secure, efficient communication between agents regardless of their underlying platform or framework. Support both synchronous request-response patterns and asynchronous event-driven communication with built-in authentication, rate limiting, and message queuing.

timeline.note: Community requested feature for multi-agent systems

title: Skill Marketplace v2
description: Enhanced marketplace with skill ratings, reviews, and monetization options.
fullDescription: Major upgrade to the Skills marketplace with community-driven ratings and reviews, skill versioning, dependency management, and creator monetization through one-time purchases or subscriptions. Include skill analytics for creators and improved discovery for users.

title: Agent Certification Program
description: Formal certification program for agents demonstrating reliability and safety standards.
fullDescription: Launch a comprehensive certification program that validates agents meet specific reliability, security, and performance standards. Include automated testing suites, manual review processes, and ongoing monitoring. Certified agents receive badges and priority placement in directories.

title: Advanced Workflow Builder
description: Visual workflow designer for creating complex multi-agent orchestrations.
fullDescription: Build an intuitive drag-and-drop workflow designer that lets developers create sophisticated multi-agent workflows without code. Support conditional logic, parallel execution, error handling, and state management. Include templates for common patterns and ability to export workflows as code.

title: MCP Server Templates Library
description: Comprehensive library of ready-to-use MCP server templates for common integrations.
fullDescription: Create and maintain a library of high-quality MCP server templates covering popular APIs and services. Include authentication flows, rate limiting, error handling, and comprehensive documentation. Support one-click deployment to major cloud providers.

title: Enterprise SSO Integration
description: Single Sign-On support for enterprise customers with SAML and OAuth.
fullDescription: Add enterprise-grade authentication with support for SAML 2.0, OAuth 2.0, and OpenID Connect. Include user provisioning/deprovisioning, role-based access control, audit logging, and integration with popular identity providers like Okta, Auth0, and Azure AD.

title: Agent Playground v3
description: Major upgrade with collaborative features and advanced debugging tools.
fullDescription: Complete redesign of the Agent Playground with real-time collaboration, advanced debugging tools, step-through execution, variable inspection, and performance profiling. Support for saving and sharing playground sessions, team workspaces, and integration with version control.

timeline.note: Beta version with core features launched

title: GraphQL API
description: Modern GraphQL API alongside existing REST endpoints for flexible data querying.
fullDescription: Launch a comprehensive GraphQL API that provides all platform functionality with flexible querying, real-time subscriptions, and optimized data fetching. Include interactive GraphQL playground, comprehensive schema documentation, and migration guide from REST endpoints.

timeline.note: GraphQL API v1 launched with full documentation

title: Skill Dependency Resolver
description: Automatic dependency resolution and version management for skills.
fullDescription: Smart dependency resolution system that automatically handles skill dependencies, version conflicts, and updates. Include semantic versioning support, dependency graphs, security vulnerability scanning, and automated update notifications.

title: Community Forums & Discussions
description: Dedicated forum platform for agent developers to share knowledge and collaborate.
fullDescription: Launch a full-featured community forum with categories for different topics, threaded discussions, reputation system, markdown support, code highlighting, search, and moderation tools. Integrate with existing user accounts and notification systems.

title: Agent Analytics Dashboard
description: Comprehensive analytics and insights for agent performance and usage patterns.
fullDescription: Build detailed analytics dashboard showing agent performance metrics, usage patterns, cost analysis, error tracking, and user behavior insights. Include custom report builder, data export capabilities, and API access for programmatic analytics.

title: Agent Versioning System
description: Git-like versioning for agents with rollback capabilities and change tracking.
fullDescription: Implement comprehensive versioning system for agents that tracks all changes, supports branching and merging, enables rollback to previous versions, and provides detailed change logs. Include A/B testing capabilities and gradual rollout controls.

title: Multi-Language SDK Support
description: Official SDKs for Python, Go, Rust, and Ruby in addition to TypeScript/JavaScript.
fullDescription: Develop and maintain official SDKs for popular programming languages beyond JavaScript/TypeScript. Each SDK should provide idiomatic interfaces, comprehensive documentation, code examples, and feature parity with the primary SDK. Include automated testing and release pipelines.

title: Agent Marketplace
description: Public marketplace for discovering and deploying pre-built agents.
fullDescription: Create a curated marketplace where developers can publish and monetize complete agent solutions. Include ratings, reviews, screenshots, live demos, usage analytics, and one-click deployment. Support both free and paid agents with revenue sharing model.

timeline.note: Highly requested feature - exploring implementation approach

title: Enterprise Support Portal
description: Dedicated support portal with SLA tracking and priority response for enterprise customers.
fullDescription: Build dedicated support portal for enterprise customers with ticket management, SLA tracking, knowledge base, priority escalation, dedicated support engineers, and 24/7 availability. Include phone support, screen sharing, and on-site consulting options for premium tiers.
